result.eng: Did you find the place?

result.eng: They act as if they owned the place.
result.ga: iompraíonn siad iad féin ar nós dá mba leosan an áit
result.orig: iompraíonn siad iad féin ar nós dá mba leosan an áit
result.html: iompraíonn siad iad féin ar nós dá mba leosan an áitThey act as if they owned the place.

result.eng: I love this place.
result.ga: is breá liom an áit seo
result.orig: is breá liom an áit seo
result.html: is breá liom an áit seoI love this place.
result.ponchtml: is breá liom an áit seoI love this place.

result.eng: They walked back to the place from which they had come.
result.ga: shiúil siad ar ais go dtí an áit as a raibh siad tar éis teacht
result.orig: shiúil siad ar ais go dtí an áit as a raibh siad tar éis teacht
result.html: shiúil siad ar ais go dtí an áit as a raibh siad tar éis teachtThey walked back to the place from which they had come.
result.ponchtml: ẛiúil siad ar ais go dtí an áit as a raiḃ siad tar éis teaċtThey walked back to the place from which they had come.

result.eng: I've been working in the same place for five years.
result.ga: tá mé ag obair san áit chéanna le cúig bliana
result.orig: tá mé ag obair san áit chéanna le cúig bliana
result.html: tá mé ag obair san áit chéanna le cúig blianaI've been working in the same place for five years.
result.ponchtml: tá mé ag obair san áit ċéanna le cúig blianaI've been working in the same place for five years.

result.eng: I know that it is at two o'clock that my interview is to take place.
result.ga: tá a fhios agam gur ag a dó a chlog atá m'agallamh ar siúl
result.orig: tá a fhios agam gur ag a dó a chlog atá m'agallamh ar siúl
result.html: tá a fhios agam gur ag a dó a chlog atá m'agallamh ar siúlI know that it is at two o'clock that my interview is to take place.
result.ponchtml: tá a ḟios agam gur ag a dó a ċlog atá m'agallaṁ ar siúlI know that it is at two o'clock that my interview is to take place.

result.eng: I have a bruise here. That is the place where I hit my hand on the car door.
result.ga: tá ballbhrú orm anseo sin an áit ar bhuail mé mo lámh ar dhoras an chairr
result.orig: tá ballbhrú orm anseo sin an áit ar bhuail mé mo lámh ar dhoras an chairr
result.html: tá ballbhrú orm anseo sin an áit ar bhuail mé mo lámh ar dhoras an chairrI have a bruise here. That is the place where I hit my hand on the car door.
result.ponchtml: tá ballḃrú orm anseo sin an áit ar ḃuail mé mo láṁ ar ḋoras an ċairrI have a bruise here. That is the place where I hit my hand on the car door.

result.eng: But if you are attempting to buy a pullover with a hood with something written in Irish on it, An Spailpín Fánach is the best place to go shopping.
result.ga: ach má tá tú ag iarraidh geansaí le cochall a cheannacht le rud eicínt scríofa i ngaeilge air is é an spailpín fánach an áit is fearr le dul ag siopadóireacht
result.orig: ach má tá tú ag iarraidh geansaí le cochall a cheannacht le rud eicínt scríofa i ngaeilge air is é an spailpín fánach an áit is fearr le dul ag siopadóireacht

result.ponchtml: aċ má tá tú ag iarraiḋ geansaí le coċall a ċeannaċt le rud eicínt scríofa i ngaeilge air is é an spailpín fánaċ an áit is fearr le dul ag siopadóireaċtBut if you are attempting to buy a pullover with a hood with something written in Irish on it, An Spailpín Fánach is the best place to go shopping.

result.eng: There's a new Italian place open in the city centre.

result.eng: I'm tired of the place and I need a change of scenery.

result.orig: tá mé tuirseach den áit agus tá malairt dreach tíre ag teastáil uaim

result.eng: Heavy rain fell later that week and floods happened in the place.
result.ga: thit báisteach throm níos deireanaí an tseachtain sin agus tharla tuilte san áit
result.orig: thit báisteach throm níos deireanaí an tseachtain sin agus tharla tuilte san áit

result.ponchtml: ṫit báisteaċ ṫrom níos deireanaí an tseaċtain sin agus ṫarla tuilte san áitHeavy rain fell later that week and floods happened in the place.

result.eng: There was a great buzz in the place.
result.ga: bhí bús iontach san áit

result.html: bhí bús iontach san áitThere was a great buzz in the place.
result.ponchtml: ḃí bús iontaċ san áitThere was a great buzz in the place.

result.eng: The place was a mess.

result.orig: bhí an áit ina chac
result.html: bhí an áit ina chacThe place was a mess.
result.ponchtml: ḃí an áit ina ċacThe place was a mess.

result.eng: She went into the storage place crouching.

result.eng: The first place I went to when I moved to Berlin was the city centre.
result.ga: an chéad áit a ndeachaigh mé nuair a bhog mé go beirlín ná lár na cathrach
result.orig: an chéad áit a ndeachaigh mé nuair a bhog mé go beirlín ná lár na cathrach

result.eng: In place of the old neighbours, a new family moved in who were always causing trouble.
result.ga: in áit na seanchomharsan bhog teaghlach nua isteach a bhí i gcónaí ag cothú trioblóide
result.orig: in áit na seanchomharsan bhog teaghlach nua isteach a bhí i gcónaí ag cothú trioblóide
result.html: in áit na seanchomharsan bhog teaghlach nua isteach a bhí i gcónaí ag cothú trioblóideIn place of the old neighbours, a new family moved in who were always causing trouble.

result.eng: The board was giving information about the history of the place.

result.orig: bhí an clár ag tabhairt eolais faoi stair na háite

result.eng: They were a day's walk from the place.
